name: Misumi Skin Brightening Gel
description: The multifunctional whitening complex of Misumi radiant white is infused with a stable vitamin C derivative and the perfect blend of eight skin beautifying plant extracts, including tree peony and strawberry geranium. Radiant white’s proven whitening, anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidative ingredients target, causes of skin dullness and skin darkening, effectively lightening and brightening skin tone over time for a beautifully fair, luminescent skin with stunning radiance. No harmful bleaching ingredients used. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
